hero.title: Turn prompts into
hero.subtitle: Build guided forms for your best prompts. Fill in the blanks, copy, paste into any AI. Set it up once, reuse forever. 100% offline.
hero.screenshotAlt: Incito desktop application showing prompt editor

items.title: Starting from scratch every time
items.description: You've written the perfect prompt before, but now you're typing it out again from memory.

items.title: No structure for reuse
items.description: Your prompts live in random notes and chat logs. No easy way to turn them into repeatable templates.

items.title: Context gets lost
items.description: You remember the prompt worked, but not the exact setup—the variables, the format, the instructions that made it work.

steps.title: Point to a folder
steps.description: Pick any folder. Incito reads your markdown prompt files from there.

steps.title: Build your instructions
steps.description: Define the questions and inputs that guide prompt creation. Labels, defaults, dropdowns—Incito turns them into a form.

steps.title: Fill in the blanks
steps.description: Come back anytime. Your instructions guide you through filling out the prompt without needing to see the template.

steps.title: Copy and paste
steps.description: One click copies your completed prompt. Paste it into any AI chatbot.

features.heading: Everything you need, nothing you don't

items.title: 100% Offline
items.description: Works completely offline. Your prompts never leave your machine—no internet required, no cloud sync, no accounts.

items.title: Instant
items.description: Native app performance. Opens in milliseconds, not seconds. No loading spinners.

items.title: Handlebars Templating
items.description: Use {{variables}}, conditionals, and helpers. Your prompts become smart templates.

items.title: Prompt Variants
items.description: Create multiple versions of any prompt. Test different tones, styles, or approaches side by side.

items.title: Bring Your Own AI (Optional)
items.description: Connect an AI provider if you want help generating prompts. Or skip it—the app works fully standalone.

items.title: Keyboard-first
items.description: Navigate, search, and copy without touching your mouse. Shortcuts for everything.

items.title: Clean UI
items.description: A distraction-free interface that gets out of your way. Light and dark modes included.

cta.heading: Build your prompt instructions today
cta.subheading: Create guided forms for your best prompts. Come back, fill in the blanks, copy. Free and offline.
